moni.quest.61FA0AACDF4AC11D.description1: A &3Precision Laser Engraver&r is used to engrave circuits onto &6Wafers&r.
moni.quest.61FA0AACDF4AC11D.description2: The type of circuit will depend on the kind of wafer used and which &aLens&r is in the machine.
moni.quest.61FA0AACDF4AC11D.title: MV Precision Laser Engraver
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.description1: &9Nitrogen&r comprises 78% of the atmosphere. Because of this, after the first few processes of &9Liquid Air&r, you'll probably have more Nitrogen than you know what to do with.
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.description2: If you got here centrifuging air, then it's gonna take you longer to get to that point.
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.description3: Even so, don't void it unless you have secured a very large stockpile. Storage is cheap and Nitrogen is used in sizeable quantities for several notable things, one of which you'll be needing very soon.
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.title: &2Nitrogen
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.description1: &6Certus Quartz&r can be grown from &6Budding Certus Quartz&r blocks!
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.description2: Check out the &9&lin-game guide&r&r or &eG&r on the item for specifics on how to get this set up.
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.description3: With enough power, you can even create your own &6Flawless Budding Certus Quartz&r, which works without ever decaying!
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.subtitle: Just like Amethyst
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.title: &9Crystal Growing
moni.quest.626330BB4A59E567.description1: Break up your &6Sand&r into &6Dust&r. Used for nothing, apart from &6Clay&r and &6Netherrack&r.
moni.quest.626330BB4A59E567.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужен Кузнецкий Молот напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.62AC7103FF9D25FD.description1: The &aImplosion Compressor&f is like an autoclave that uses explosions instead of water.
moni.quest.62AC7103FF9D25FD.description2: It is the only way to turn some gem dusts into gemstones. However, for some gemstones, like &6Apatite&r, it is much more efficient to use an &3Autoclave&r&r with &9Distilled Water&r.
moni.quest.62AC7103FF9D25FD.description3: It is also vital for processing &5Motes of Omnium&f.
moni.quest.62AC7103FF9D25FD.title: &2Implosion Compressor
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description1: &3Волочильный стан&r — значительный прыжок в эффективности, позволяющий удвоить производство &6проводов&r за каждый слиток. Но для начала нужно сделать несколько &6моторов&r.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description2: Машины в &bGregTech&r создаются из ряда компонетов, многие из которых используются в разных машинах. &6Моторы&r используются в множестве рецептов, включая и другие компоненты.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description3: &3Влочильному стану&r для работы необходима &6программируемая схема&r. В каждой машине есть одна встроенная — ячейка схемы в &9левом нижнем углу&r интерфейса. Для создания одножильных проводов оставьте схему на &eконфигурации 1&r. Сверяйтесь с рецептом в &eEMI&r, чтобы понять какую конфигурацию нужно. Для подробностей прочтите соседний квест.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description4: Как сделаете волочильный стан, &eзадумайтесь над созданием нескольких стопок&r моторов низкого напряжения. Может прозвучать экстремально, но &eсоздание партиями&r в подобной манере — очень полезная привычка. Таким образом, вам не придётся возвращаться к этому вновь ближайшее время и в будущем вы используйте &oвсе&r моторы, так что материалы не уходят в пустую.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description5: Когда у вас будет больше машин вам больше не придется создавать что-то вручную. Вместо этого вы будете разрабатывать заводы по автоматизации производства за вас. Всегда полезно иметь запас часто используемых ингридиетов таких как схемы и детали, что бы не приходилось ждать пока они сделаются, когда они так нужны.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description6: &2Если звуки машин GT уже начали надоедать, вы можете заглушить их молотом GT &9или заглушить звук полностью в меню ESM через кнопку в инвентаре.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.subtitle: Начало заводов
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.title: &2Волочильный стан низкого напряжения
moni.quest.62C8DB9874421C79.description1: The &3Sequential Fabricator&r is an alternative to the &bEnder IO&r &3Crafter&r and the &bExtendedCrafting&r &3Auto Crafting Table&r. It is the most intuitive of the three, and can handle bucket crafting using Fluids.
moni.quest.62C8DB9874421C79.subtitle: More reliable than a Crafter
moni.quest.631F5DFF43F7A289.description1: The &6Extended Molecular Assembler&r is able to perform &a8 crafts at a time&r, and does each of those crafts &atwice as fast&r, meaning this assembler can do some serious work.
moni.quest.631F5DFF43F7A289.subtitle: More Parallel Crafting
moni.quest.631F5DFF43F7A289.title: &9Extended Assembling
moni.quest.634E056463ED1532.description2: This alloy is cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and cooled in a &3Vacuum Freezer&r.
moni.quest.634E056463ED1532.title: Tungstensteel
moni.quest.637953544CE66BDB.description1: Some of these simulations will start to consume tremendous amounts of power at this point, so if you're finding it a struggle, don't be afraid to hold off on progressing through these data models until a later time.
moni.quest.637953544CE66BDB.title: &8End&r Mobs
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.description1: This is your first Micro Miner ever. &2You'll need that Phosphorous in the LV Field Generators.&r
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.description2: Yes, not the last: these things aren't reusable.
Can also be used to bring &bStellar Creation Data&r, but less efficiently than the Tier Two.
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.description3: Чтобы узнать, что может принести этот микрокопатель, проверьте &bEMI&r и ознакомьтесь с его возможными миссиями.
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.title: &2First Foray Into The Microverse
moni.quest.6391447F1A411281.description1: Double Plates used exclusively for the Tier Eight and Tier Eleven Micro Miners.
moni.quest.6391447F1A411281.title: Crystal Matrix Double Plates
moni.quest.63969C74693044BA.title: Элемент 006: Углерод
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description1: В этой сборке есть &aпосек&r — блок схожий на песок, который моментально выращивает сахарный тросник/кактус на нём, когда тот обновляется через обновление состояния блока или обновление редстоуна.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description2: Производимый сахарный тросник можно использовать как топливо для динамо, а позже варить его в &9биомассу&r.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description3: Этот квест требует &aредстоуновые часы&r, но существуют и другие способы заставить посек выращивать сахарный тросник ещё быстрее (например, оригинальные часы из наблюдателей, смотрящие в посек). Убедитесь, что поставили таймер пульсировать как можно чаще.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description4: Для сбора тросника используйте наблюдатель и поршень.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description5: На первое время &3вакуумого сундука&r должно хватать для сбора предметов с пола и создавать меньше лагов, по сравнению с воронками. &aУлучшение бездны&r в &6ящике&r будет автоматически удалять переизбыток вместимости ящика. Это хороший способ снизить нагрузку на сервер от большого количества тросника, пока у вас не появятся другие разрушители блоков.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.subtitle: Да, посек.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.title: Посек
moni.quest.63CC578C3558E0AF.description1: The &3Hyperbolic Microverse Projector&r is the most powerful projector, capable of running hundreds of missions in parallel. It can perform all previous Micro Miner missions, and opens the door to many new ones.
moni.quest.63CC578C3558E0AF.description2: &6Sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.63CC578C3558E0AF.title: &9Hyperbolic Microverse Projector
moni.quest.63EB8CC34802E56A.description1: Combining &6Eternal Catalysts&r, &6Activated Netherite Ingots&r, and &6Neutronium Ingots&r will give you the core to one of the most powerful materials.
moni.quest.63EB8CC34802E56A.subtitle: Are you ready to go infinite?
moni.quest.63EB8CC34802E56A.title: &9Dormant Infinity Compound
moni.quest.63F438F7033521C3.description1: Melting &6Mana Dust&r in a &3Fluid Extractor&r produces &9Primal Mana&r, which is needed for smelting various alloys from &bThermal Expansion&r.
moni.quest.63F438F7033521C3.title: Primal Mana
moni.quest.6416118459258E42.title: Элемент 095: Америций
moni.quest.645B1DCB3DA7198A.description1: &6Нить&r и &6угольная пыль&r вместе выпекаются в &6углеродное волокно&r в &3печи для сплавов&r.
moni.quest.645B1DCB3DA7198A.description2: Объедините его с &6пульсирующей пылью&r, чтобы получить &6пульсирующее волокно&r.
moni.quest.645B1DCB3DA7198A.title: Пульсирующее волокно
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description1: &2Sulfuric Acid is mainly produced in a 3-step process:&r
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description2: -&6 Sulfur&o&r added to &9Oxygen&r to produce &9Sulfur Dioxide&r. &9SO₂&r also can come from treating certain &6Sulfur-containing Dusts&r with &9Oxygen&r in the EBF, or by processing &eNether Air&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description3: - &9Sulfur Dioxide&r added to more &9Oxygen&r, with &cVanadium Pentoxide&r catalyst, to produce &9Sulfur Trioxide&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description4: - &9Sulfur Trioxide&r added to &9Water&r, to produce &eSulfuric Acid&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description5: The shortcut Sulfur + Water reaction is locked behind the Large Chemical Reactor, unlocked at EV.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description6: You can also get Sulfuric Acid by adding &9Oxygen&r to &9Hydrogen Sulfide&r, which can be obtained via Petroleum, or by combining &9Hydrogen&r and &6Sulfur&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description7: &rYou'll need huge amounts of this for a whole range of chemical reactions, as it is a very common ingredient.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description8: Sulfur can be electrolyzed from many things.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.title: &2Sulfuric Acid
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description1: Теперь вам доступны &2гидротрубопроводы GregTech CEUM&r, значительно улучшенные по сравнению с их версиями из CE. Их преимущество — более высокая &9пропускная способность&r, но они имеют ограничения по типам жидкостей (&eкислоты, газы&r и т. д.), которые они могут безопасно транспортировать. Загляните в подсказки материала каждого трубопровода, чтобы узнать подробности. Гидротрубопроводы требуют насос для извлечения жидкостей из резервуаров или машин, не обладающих функцией автовывода, зато &9насосы ультранизкого напряжения (также как и другие насадки) теперь можно приобрести за монимонеты&r.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description2: Также существуют &6четверные и девятикратные трубопроводы&r, которые позволяют транспортировать несколько типов жидкостей через один и тот же блок.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description3: &6Гидротрубопроводы&r &bEnder IO&r тоже сгодятся. Их преимущество в том, что они являются &6каналами&r, что позволяет им занимать тот же блок, что и другие &6каналы&r.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description4: Вы можете использовать мод &9LaserIO&r, позволяющий настроить компактную и довольно комплексную фильтрацию транспортировки, хоть он и немного дороговат.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.title: &9GTЖидкостные транспортировочные трубы
moni.quest.64B145DC53023119.description1: When you have enough materials, you can craft Uranium isotope clumps into Low-Enriched Uranium-235 Fuel (or &6LEU-235&r, for short). This fuel uses an 8:1 ratio of U238 to U235.
moni.quest.64B145DC53023119.description2: This fuel is processed in your &3Fission Reactor&r by placing it in the controller. When a redstone signal is applied it will burn the fuel, generating some power from the reactor and after a while you'll get &6Depleted LEU-235 Fuel&r.
moni.quest.64B145DC53023119.description3: The depleted fuel is separated in a regular &3Centrifuge&r, resulting in many tiny clumps of fissile materials: &6Uranium 238&r, &6Neptunium 237&r, &6Plutonium 239&r, and &6Plutonium 241&r.
moni.quest.64B145DC53023119.title: Uranium 235 Fission
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description1: The &3Extruder&r is an alternative way to form shapes from metal. &aExtruder Shapes&r are used for telling an Extruder which shape to make.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description2: Extruders are &2no longer strictly needed for Large Pipes.&r Extruders use ingots, but are as efficient for making &6Gears&r as melting and solidifying. They are also the most efficient way to make &6Bolts&r, &6Small Gears&r, and &6Rings&r.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description3: You can also use Extruders to make things from other machines like plates and wires, but they are less efficient than using the dedicated machines for these purposes.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description4: &2There is also an LV version, but most of the Extruder's recipes must be run at MV or higher.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.title: &2Измельчитель
moni.quest.64C33333ECCAABC7.description1: With some now-standard components you can upgrade a few &6Crystal Proessors&r into a &6Crystal Processor Assembly&r.
moni.quest.64C33333ECCAABC7.title: The Third Tier Six Circuits
moni.quest.64CD4BDBEBD0353D.title: Элемент 063: Европий
moni.quest.64F45D98FA48D834.description1: Combining &6Basic RF Capacitors&r with some &6Coal Dust&r and &6Energetic Alloy&r produces a &6Double-Layer RF Capacitor&r.
moni.quest.64F45D98FA48D834.description2: This is a tier two capacitor. Higher tier RF Capacitors will make &bEnder IO&r machines process faster and depending on the machine will expand their capabilities further (like area of effect).
moni.quest.65B610CF9324F6B2.description1: The final form of the &6Infinity Catalyst&r. It processes 16 &cDormant Infinity Compound Ingots&r at a time, essentially increasing your &6Infinity Ingot&r output per &6Heart of a Universe&r by &e16x&r.
moni.quest.65B610CF9324F6B2.subtitle: Spend Monium to make Monium
moni.quest.65B610CF9324F6B2.title: &9Serene Infinity Catalyst
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.description1: The Third Micro Miner. &2You'll need that Boron in the MV Field Generators.&r
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.description2: Вот некоторые из материалов, которые вы можете добыть с помощью этого микромайнера: &6неодим&r, &6изумруд&r, &6сурьма&r, &6лаурит&r и &6купрородсит&r.
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.description3: На этом этапе игры микромайнеры могут добыть для вас большинство основных ресурсов, продолжайте проверять &bEMI&r, чтобы узнать, что они могут вам дать.
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.title: &2Tier Three Micro Miner
moni.quest.6646E6DBEF368924.description1: &3Pattern P2P&r is somewhat like the other &aP2P&r types, but is able to copy a pattern provider's patterns to all of its outputs.
moni.quest.6646E6DBEF368924.description2: For example, you could have a Pattern P2P Input placed on a pattern provider, then 5 Outputs with the same ID placed on Assemblers. All 5 of those Assemblers would then &6act as if they each had their own pattern provider that all just so happened to have the same exact patterns&r, and will obey blocking rules, parallelize, and such.
moni.quest.6646E6DBEF368924.title: &9Pattern P2P
moni.quest.6648CD525CE34898.title: Элемент 008: Кислород
moni.quest.66CA4A42DD474383.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужен Кузнецкий Молот напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description1: This pack is intended to be played in the &bOverworld&r and &bLost City Dimensions&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description2: If you wish to build your base in total safety, place the &6Void World Cake&r down on the ground, and eat a slice to be sent to the &7Void World&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description3: The &2Overworld&r has ores to mine, and is a great place to gather resources.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description4: Simply place down and eat any dimensional cake for access to that dimension.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description5: If you're playing with friends, don't forget to invite them to an &eFTB Teams party&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description6: Features new to &2CEu&r and quests with new content will be higlighted in &2dark green&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description7: Features new to &9Monifactory&r and quests with new content will be higlighted in &9Blue&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.subtitle: Welcome to Monifactory
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.title: &9Genesis
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.description1: This compass will lead you to the nearest meteor impact. Use your favorite mining tools to smash through the &6Skystone&r shell and get to the juicy center where a &6Mysterious Cube&r with the plates are found.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.description2: Please note that while they're often in a big crater, the meteors might be buried underground; when the compass is spinning wildly, you're right on top of one.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.subtitle: &bApplied Energistics&r uses &aPresses&r found in cubes at the heart of meteors as templates for &3Inscribers&r to make &6inscribed circuits&r.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.title: Meteorite Hunter
moni.quest.6728FB92FD3A2084.description2: &6Americium 242&r and &6Americium 243&r are used to make &6LEA-242 Fuel&r.
moni.quest.6728FB92FD3A2084.description3: There's also &6Americium 241&r, but this is only useful for making RTGs (which produce small amounts of RF continuously) or decaying down into &6Neptunium&r.
moni.quest.6728FB92FD3A2084.description4: &6Depleted LEA 242 Fuels&r&r will return a lot of &6Curium 246&r, and small amounts of the other three isotopes.
moni.quest.6728FB92FD3A2084.subtitle: You only need one of this quest's dependencies
moni.quest.6728FB92FD3A2084.title: Americium Fission
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description1: The &3Assembly Line&r needs to be provided with &edata&r on how to craft items before it can craft them. Data on how to craft each item is stored in a &6Data Stick&r and read by a &aData Access Hatch&r. This data is required to craft &6LuV components&r and the &3Fusion Reactor&r, among other things.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description2: To begin, craft a &3Scanner&r and a few &6Data Sticks&r. The initial Scanner recipes run at &6HV&r, but &1IV&r is required relatively soon so might as well make that one.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description3: Press &bR&r on the item you want to craft in the and navigate to the &bScanner tab&r. This will tell you which item needs to be scanned to make the data for the new item. For example, &9LuV &6Electric Motors&r will require an &1IV&r &6Electric Motor&r to be scanned.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description4: Place a &6Data Stick&r with the item to be scanned in the &3Scanner&r. The item will be &cconsumed&r and its data will be written to the &6Data Stick&r. Each &6Data item&r can only hold a &csingle recipe&r.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description5: Finally, place the &6Data Stick&r into the &aData Access Hatch&r of your &3Assembly Line&r. It will now be able to craft that item.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description6: Later, you will need more advanced &6Data Orbs&r and &6Data Modules&r to store data, and a &3Data Bank&r to read them.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description7: If you need to create duplicate Data items, you can copy the data to a blank data item of the same type using the Scanner.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.title: &9Assembly Line Data
moni.quest.67591B6025C03130.description1: As the name suggests, this catalyst is formed from exotic non-elemental materials and alloys.
moni.quest.67591B6025C03130.subtitle: A small appetizer, before the &9Omnium&r main course.
moni.quest.67663B49B80849C1.description1: &6Wetware Supercomputers&r are made in an &3Assembly Line&r at ZPM or better power.
moni.quest.67663B49B80849C1.description2: You'll need &6Europium&r from the &3Fusion Reactor&r to craft these.
moni.quest.67663B49B80849C1.title: The Second Tier Eight Circuits
moni.quest.67833AE5421E10D4.description1: &6Crystal CPUs&r are the cores of &6Crystal Circuits&r.
moni.quest.67833AE5421E10D4.description2: You'll need a &2LuV Laser Engraver&r to craft this.
moni.quest.67833AE5421E10D4.title: &2Crystal Processing Unit
moni.quest.6792DF5F9F320B98.description1: Turn your &6Glass&r into &6Quartz&r. An &3Arc Furnace&r making &6Glass&r supports 2.5 &3Electrolyzers&r of the same tier. You will need a lot of &6Quartz&r, so it's crucial that you passive this.
moni.quest.6792DF5F9F320B98.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужен Электролизер напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.67C7895F2722D348.description1: &6&6Redstone&r, &6Sulfur&r, and &6Blaze Powder&r creates &6Pyrotheum Dust&r, a mixture imbued with potent elemental flame.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.description1: All unformatted Storage Cells are limited to at most 63 distinct item types, with the first item of each new type taking up a chunk of the total bytes of cell storage, and subsequent items of existing types taking a small number of bytes thereafter.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.description2: A &61k ME Storage Cell&r is the first and smallest cell for storing items. If you are going to be storing many different kinds of items in your network, you will need to make an &6ME Drive&r and fill it with multiple Storage Cells.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.description3: The &64k ME Storage Cell&r is the next size up. With four times the bytes it holds substantially more items per type, but it requires a more advanced technology than you currently have available: AE &6Processors&r made in an &3Inscriber&r.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.subtitle: &bApplied Energistics&r uses &6Storage Cells&r as its primary means of digital item and fluid storage.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.title: Digital Storage At Last
moni.quest.68734C70E2D19616.description1: Turns out corrupting a Microverse has some other interesting consequences, including creating &6Singularities&r. These impossibilities may just be what you need to create an impossibly perfect circuit line, but you do need to be able to contain it in some way.
moni.quest.68734C70E2D19616.description2: Thankfully, you already have a metal that bends the rules, so that should be a good starting place.
moni.quest.68CB6AD16F1041E5.subtitle: unlocks nm and hm quests
moni.quest.68CB6AD16F1041E5.title: &eNot EM
moni.quest.68CE119F73B6FACF.title: Элемент 048: Кадмий
moni.quest.69BFFF8BFB3B3B5C.description1: Crush your &6Glass&r into &6Glass Dust&r. Used for nothing, apart from &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r.
moni.quest.69BFFF8BFB3B3B5C.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужен Измельчитель напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.69E77BD01CFF65EB.description1: It smelts items at a blazing quick &a5 ticks&r each. At this point, you might as well just make a &3Multi Smelter&r.
moni.quest.69E77BD01CFF65EB.title: Печь 8.0
moni.quest.6A262AA410619C23.description1: Ещё один нужный компонент в любой машине, которая работает с жидкостями. Также полезна как насадка для перемещения жидкостей между машинами &bGregTech&r и соседними резервуарами или машинами.
moni.quest.6A262AA410619C23.description2: Вам понадобятся &6резиновые кольца&r, которые вырезаются из пластин &aножом&r. Примитивный хрупкий нож можно сделать из палки и куска кремния или сверьтесь с &eEMI&r для рецепта из металла.
moni.quest.6A262AA410619C23.title: Помпы низкого напряжения
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description1: Open your inventory and look at the top-left corner of the screen. Click the map-looking icon called &eClaim Manager&r.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description2: &6Click a chunk&r to claim it as yours. This will prevent unwanted creeper explosions and other players from interacting with your base.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description3: &eIf you're playing on a server with custom settings, ask the server owner what methods are available&f.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description4: To invite players to your &bFTB Utils&f party, look for a corresponding button in the same corner. Parties share claimed chunks with each other. You can configure permissions for your party's claimed chunks in the party settings menu.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.subtitle: You might be wondering what chunkloading options there are in the pack.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.title: Claim Your Chunks and Invite Teammates!
moni.quest.6A8764DDD3489EE8.description1: Waystones also &anaturally generate&r across the world, so nothing is stopping you from simply roaming around and stealing Waystones for your own needs.
moni.quest.6A8764DDD3489EE8.title: Exploration can pay off!
moni.quest.6A914B240E1A7BCB.description1: This alloy is made from &2mixing 2 Gold Dust, 1 Redstone, and 1 Glowstone Dust in a Mixer, creating Energetic Alloy Dust,&r and putting it in your new &3Electric Blast Furnace&r.
moni.quest.6A914B240E1A7BCB.description2: Throw &2the prepared dust into the input bus&r and in twenty seconds your &6Energetic Alloy Ingot&r will be in the output bus.
moni.quest.6A914B240E1A7BCB.description3: &2In EV, you can build an Alloy Blast Smelter which performs the recipe faster.
moni.quest.6ABD83B58FADD4DF.description1: &6Cryococcus&r, &9Bathyal Energy Cores&r, and &6Stabilized Einsteinium&r can be used to create a &9Abyssal Energy Core&r.
moni.quest.6ABD83B58FADD4DF.description2: This is an important component in the Tier Nine and Tier Ten Micro Miners, as well as some End Game items.
moni.quest.6ABD83B58FADD4DF.title: &9Abyssal Energy Core
moni.quest.6ABF927014F8B79D.description1: Уметь летать - приятно. Это первый джетпак, использующий материалы из &bEnder IO&r.
moni.quest.6ABF927014F8B79D.description2: Ещё есть цепочка квестов для джетпаков из &bThermal Expansion&r (начиная с &6Свинцового Джетпака&r). Со временем вам понадобится сделать обе, но совсем не скоро, поэтому не стесняйтесь игнорировать хотя бы одну из цепочек квестов, если только вам не &oочень&r нравится летать.
moni.quest.6B121BEFD852BC2D.description1: &3Золотые печки&f опять повышают скорость, переплавляя один предмет всего за &a40 тиков&f.
moni.quest.6B121BEFD852BC2D.title: Печь 5.0
moni.quest.6B4A50B6F9F835EF.description1: Cool down your &6Lava&r into &6Obsidian&r. You'll need a lot of this, so it's probably wise to use &3Rock Breakers&r once you hit &6HV&r, as they produce &6Obsidian&r without consuming anything.
moni.quest.6B908DECFA46C8E0.description1: The &3HV Circuit Assembling Machine&r unlocks &2the Mainframe. That's it.&r
moni.quest.6B908DECFA46C8E0.description2: It can also optionally overclock recipes up to 128 EU/t, gaining additional speed for relatively more power.
moni.quest.6B908DECFA46C8E0.title: &2HV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.6BBACA979DF9BA30.title: debug: undo hm
moni.quest.6BE1CD77618EC6C7.description1: &2Thin Polyphenylene Sulfide Sheets are required for wrapping LuV+ cables.
moni.quest.6BE1CD77618EC6C7.title: &2Polyphenylene Sulfide
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.description1: Combines &bStellar Creation Data&r into &9Universe Creation Data&r, which is a crucial component for the Tier Ten Micro Miner mission.
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.description2: The alternate mission brings a decent quantity of &6Neutronium&r. It might be easier to just make all your Neutronium in the reactor, but it's up to you.
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.description3: The Tier Nine Micro Miner will also be important later on, as it will be your main source of &9Quasi-Stable Neutron Stars&r.
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.title: Tier Nine Micro Miner
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.description1: To make &9Tritanium&r, you first need to make &9Duranium&r. This is done by fusing &9Liquid Gallium&r and &9Radon&r in a &3Fusion Reactor MK I&r or better.
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.description2: Once you have Duranium, you can fuse Tritanium in a &3Fusion Reactor MK II&r using the Duranium and &9Liquid Titanium&r.
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.description3: If you're having trouble figuring out the right item and fluid ratios for batching up these processes, consider plugging the relevant recipes into &aEMI&r.
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.title: &2Tritanium Ingot
moni.quest.6C8DE5DC18CDADF0.description1: &6Annealed Copper&r is made &2in an Arc Furnace&r by treating &6Copper&r with &9Oxygen&r. It has less power loss than regular Copper when used as a cable, and is also required for more advanced electronic components.
moni.quest.6C8DE5DC18CDADF0.title: Annealed Copper
moni.quest.6CE6674C20500023.description1: Nothing special about this tier either.
moni.quest.6CE6674C20500023.title: The Second Tier Six Circuits
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description1: Главное задача этой машины это превращать &6истинный кварц&r в &6заряжённый истинный кварц&r.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description2: Это устройство запитывается с РТ через энергопроводы или может использовать энергию АЕ из сети через МЕ провод или кабеля.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description3: Он принимает энергию через &9пять&r сторон. Какие &9пять&r сторон? Довольно просто догадаться.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description4: Также его можно запросто автоматизировать: воронаками импортировать ингредиенты с верхней стороны, или сбоку, и экспортировать готовый продукт снизу.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.title: Зарядка кварца
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description1: Petrochemistry is the category of organic chemistry pertaining to petroleum, otherwise known as &9Oil&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description2: &bGregTech&r's petrochemistry may seem daunting at first, given the sheer number of chemicals and processing options, but it's actually easier to get into than you think.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description3: Oil is the starting point, and can be found in several variants which you can pump from finite natural wells in the Overworld, as well as coming renewably from &6Oilsands Ore&r and &6Soul Sand&r, and directly in liquid form from a &3Fluid Rig&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description4: &2The Fluid Rig can also harvest Raw Oil, Heavy Oil, and Light Oil depending on your fluid vein. Raw Oil is similar to Oil, giving the same ratios when distilled but needing double the fluid. Heavy Oil and Light Oil give different ratios when distilled.&r
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description5: Start off by distilling the Oil. This will result in &9Sulfuric Heavy Fuel&r, &9Sulfuric Light Fuel&r, &9Sulfuric Naphtha&r, and/or &9Sulfuric Gas&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description6: These will all need to be hydrodesulfurized using &9Hydrogen&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r, which produces the non-Sulfuric versions.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description7: All of these products are useful, so figure out how you want to store the variety and large quantities of fluids.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description8: The upcoming quests will guide you through the basics of petrochemistry. Once you've mastered that, feel free to explore further.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.title: Navigating Petrochem
moni.quest.6D61F343826FD239.description1: The best source of &6Cobblestone&r is &bThermal &6Igneous Extruders&r. If the first one isn't enough, you can always upgrade and make more of them.&r This is the starting point of your &eCobbleworks&r.
moni.quest.6D70F91101D8CBB4.description1: &6&6Redstone&r, a &6Snowball&r, and &6Blizz Powder&r creates &6Cryotheum Dust&r, a mixture imbued with potent elemental frost.
moni.quest.6DAA25CA26AE05E9.description1: Now that you have some &6MV circuits&r, you can make a &6Factory Augment&r that lets you &2smelt multiple items at once&r with your furnaces!
moni.quest.6DAA25CA26AE05E9.subtitle: Multi smelter, sort of!
moni.quest.6DAA25CA26AE05E9.title: Factory Augment
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description1: The &3Assembly Line&r is a large multiblock structure that crafts complex materials, similar to an &3Assembling Machine&r. These will be crucial going forward for making a variety of components and machinery.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description2: Make sure your power generation and circuit production are up to the challenge. &2None of the Assembly Line recipes require programmed circuits anymore.&r
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description3: This quest calls for an Assembly Line that's 10 units long, allowing for 9 inputs and one output. This is a large enough Assembly Line to make &6LuV components&r, but you'll need to expand to more inputs for later projects.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description4: The structure of the Assembly Line is a little stricter than other multiblocks:
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description5: - The &aInput Buses&r can only be placed along the bottom, must all be &8ULV&r tier, and must face downwards. The &aOutput Bus&r must be placed at the very end of the row of Input Buses, and can be any tier.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description6: - &aFluid Hatches&r can only replace the &6Steel Casings&r along the bottom.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description7: - &aEnergy Hatches&r can only be placed within the top row of &6Steel Casings&r.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description8: - The &2Data Access Hatch&r must replace a &6Grate Casing&r on the same side as the Assembly Line controller block. Later, you can replace this with an &2Optical Data Reception Hatch&r. Refer to adjacent quests for how the Assembly Line data system works.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description9: If your recipe is not running, ensure you have the corresponding &edata&r for the recipe in a &2Data Access Hatch&r or connected &3Data Bank&r.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.title: &2Assembly Line
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.description1: &6RTM Alloy&r is the fourth coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 4500K so it can process more advanced materials.
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.description2: Если вы еще не сделали &2Платиновую линию&r, вы можете получить небольшое количество &6Рутения&r для этих катушек из &6Лаурита и Купродсита&r, которые добываются с помощью миссии микромайнера 3 уровня.
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.title: &9RTM Alloy Coil Blocks
moni.quest.6DEA5CE28A667453.title: &9Resonant Backpack
moni.quest.6DF2C1E88BE7CE5F.description1: The prelude to the final coil tier.
moni.quest.6DF2C1E88BE7CE5F.description2: Traditionally made by combining 9 &9Omnium Nuggets&r into an ingot, but by the time you are making &6Omnic Matrix Coils&r, you will probably already have the &3Creative Quantum Tank&r and be able to simply solidify all the required ingots.
moni.quest.6E06505BC7636985.description1: Mainly used for decorational blocks. Still part of &eCobbleworks&r I guess.
moni.quest.6E06505BC7636985.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужна Печь.
moni.quest.6E16CEC90AA82C32.description1: Split your &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r into &6Silicon Dust and Oxygen&r. This is the best source of Early Game &6Oxygen&r, although distilling &6Liquid Air&r may be better later, depending on your situation.
moni.quest.6E16CEC90AA82C32.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужен Измельчитель напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.6E16CEC90AA82C32.title: Silicon and Oxygen
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description1: You can easily automate most &bGregTech&r machines with &aME Pattern Providers&r and processing &aPatterns&r early on by using the machines' auto-output feature.
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description2: Use &9the Machine's GUI&r to relocate the output side of a machine where you want it to be, then press the "Auto Output" and "Permit Input" buttons, and put an ME Pattern Provider on that side of the machine.
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description3: You can also permit input from the output side by shift-right-clicking with a screwdriver on the output side via the machine grid.
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description4: Right-click the machine and enable item auto-output (&6orange box&r in the bottom-left corner of the GUI).
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description5: Now, stuff the ME Pattern Provider with processing patterns. The next time you order an item, the ME Pattern Provider will push ingredients into the machine, and the machine will push outputs back into the Pattern Provider once they're ready, completing the craft. No need to use nodes or import buses!
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description6: Furthermore, you can use Blocking Mode, which ensures that no items are in the inventory before placing the items in, which is a handy way to prevent conflicts. Even better, blocking mode now ignores Programmable Circuits and Molds! Please note that non-consumable items should stay in the machine, and not be included in the pattern made. Yes, this means you should make a separate machine for each non-consumable, at least until you get Large Machines.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description1: &6Indium&r is a rare material requiring specialized bulk ore processing to acquire. It is useful for making &6Indium Gallium Phosphide&r (InGaP).
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description2: You will need to purify (with a &3Washer&r or &3Chemical Bath&r) &6Galena&r and &6Sphalerite&r to get &6Crushed Purified&r dusts. These need to be placed together in a &3Chemical Reactor&r along with &9Sulfuric Acid&r, which will result in &9Indium Concentrate&r.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description3: This in turn needs to be reacted with &6Aluminium&r in another Chemical Reactor, to create &2Small Piles of Indium Dust, Aluminium Sulfite and &9Lead-Zinc Solution&r. The latter two can be centrifuged into various useful materials, and the Indium piles can be combined into full dusts.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description4: &2Indium can also be obtained from the Naquadah processing chain in LuV.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.title: Indium
moni.quest.6EA130B04FDE6868.description1: &6Omnium Coils&r are the final coil type you will need. At &a12600K&r, they're capable of smelting every material and make your EBF look &4f&6a&eb&au&2l&3o&9u&ds&5.
moni.quest.6EA130B04FDE6868.title: &9Omnic Matrix Coil
moni.quest.6ED1605A65CF3724.description1: &6Yttrium Barium Cuprate&r (more accurately, Yttrium Barium Copper Oxide, or YBCO) is, among other things, a high-temperature superconductor material.
moni.quest.6ED1605A65CF3724.description2: This is used as plates in &3Nuclearcraft&r, and will become an important cable material for later tiers of &bGregTech&r components.
moni.quest.6F11E32BA70CA38C.description1: Bits of a &6Blitz Rod&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.6F11E32BA70CA38C.title: Blitz Powder
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description1: Encode them in a &aPattern Encoding Terminal&r.
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description2: Note that recipes encoded with Substitutions on will use existing equivalent items, but &ewill only automatically craft the exact item specified in the recipe.&r
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description3: &2Don't encode recipes that use hand tools.&r Otherwise, you risk jamming your system due to durability or NBT mismatches.
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description4: Use recipes that use machines instead!
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.subtitle: &aPatterns&r are used to encode a single crafting table or processing recipe for on-demand automation with &bApplied Energistics&r.
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.title: Autocrafting Patterns
moni.quest.6F5BB99060FF03AC.description1: At this point, if you are not already using a &2Multiblock&r to perform your Circuit Assembler recipes, you really should be.
moni.quest.6F5BB99060FF03AC.title: &9The Third Tier Eight Circuit
moni.quest.6F76D81C52F0E04C.title: Элемент 022: Титан
moni.quest.6F7D6294E9F311E4.title: Элемент 099: Эйнштейний
moni.quest.6F9041F256F517A3.subtitle: No hypothetical aliens were harmed in the harvesting of this item.
moni.quest.6FB0357E12499B5F.description1: &2The Large Ore Drilling Plants mine ores from under them in a large radius. They require Drilling Fluid to operate.
moni.quest.6FB0357E12499B5F.description2: They automatically macerate the ores, yielding 3 times more crushed ore than a normal Macerator, plus the normal amount of byproduct.
moni.quest.6FB0357E12499B5F.title: &2Large Miner
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.description1: Going out in search of a &6Rubber Tree&f is a viable option for sure. However, if this isn't appealing, you can also &eshear leaves&f and make &6Plantballs&f out of them. Plantballs smelt into &6Slime&f, and Slime smelts into &6Sticky Resin&f.
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.description2: You'll want to transition to Rubber Trees at some point, though, since the &eratio of leaves to rubber is quite poor&f.
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.description3: Rubber can be hammered into sheets just like metals can be turned into plates. It's quite inefficient to do it this way, but such is the life of early game &bGregTech&f. At least rubber isn't particularly hard to come by.
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.title: Rubber Sheets
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description1: The &6Numismatic Dynamo&r is the main source of power through the Mid Game of the pack.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description2: Paired with a self-sustaining &bHostile Neural Networks&r setup, this dynamo can burn through &6Diamonds&r to produce large amounts of &eRF power&r.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description3: Just like other &bThermal Expansion&r dynamos, the &6Numismatic Dynamo&r can be given &eAugments&r to produce more power.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.title: Numismatic Power
moni.quest.6FE459376BF7ABBA.description1: &9Hydrogen Sulfide&r is a byproduct of hydrodesulfurization. &2It also comes from distilling Liquid Nether Air.&r
moni.quest.6FE459376BF7ABBA.description2: A simple chemical reaction with &9Water&r reprocesses it into the useful &9Sulfuric Acid&r, or it can be electrolyzed for recovering the &9Hydrogen&r.
moni.quest.6FE459376BF7ABBA.title: &2Hydrogen Sulfide
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description1: &oДиоксид кремния — важная часть производственного процесса. Проверьте вкладку «Производственные процессы» для большей наглядности, полезной информации и подсказок.&r
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description2: Примерно на этом этапе потребуется большое количество &6водорода&r и &6кислорода&r.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description3: Первый способ, что приходит на ум, это электролиз &9воды&r, но этот процесс медленный.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description4: Вместо этого, на ранних этапах &6кислород&r лучше всего получать из &6диоксида кремния&r.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description5: С &6водородом&r будет посложнее: объедините &6метан&r и &6воду&r в &3хим. реакторе&r. &6Метан&r можно получить путём обработки &6еды&r или &6дерева&r в центрифуге, обработки &6побочных продуктов пиролиза&r, или через &6петрохимию&r.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description6: На данный момент в небольших количествах достаточно будет электролиза &9воды&r. Но помните про другие способы, что могут быть полезны позднее.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.title: Водород и Кислород
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.description1: &n&9Monifactory&r&r shares an official Discord server with Pansmith's other projects, which serves as a useful community resource.
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.description2: On the server, there are flowcharts and guides to help you with many parts of the pack accessable via the server's helpful bot, development announcements and more are available in the &n#announcements&r channel, and the community helps with tech support questions, and investigates possible bug reports.
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.description3: You can also chat with many fellow players there if you like, who are largely willing to help with general questions one might have.
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.rich_descrip: To join the server, you can use the button on the Main Menu to go to the join URL, or if you're not into Discord you can find other projects from the modpack author on
Issue tracking and development is handled on the respective GitHub project repositories. The repository for this pack is
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.subtitle: what's a voltage? can I eat it?
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.title: Discord and GitHub
moni.quest.7045BE273C44BA35.description1: The &3Aquatic Entangler&r is an alternative to the &bGregtech&r &3Fisher&r for producing &6Fish&r. You may find it to be useful later to produce &6Mincemeat&r en masse.
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description1: &6Wrought Iron&r is a better alternative than &6Iron&r for tools, and with the &3Alloy Smelter&r you finally have a way to manufacture it, albeit slowly.
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description2: First, you put Iron Ingots the &3Alloy Smelter&r with a &6Nugget Mold&r to create Iron Nuggets. Those Nuggets are then smelted in any &3Furnace&r to create &6Wrought Iron Nuggets.&r
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description3: Finally, you can turn those &6Wrought Iron Nuggets&r into a &6Wrought Iron Ingot&r with another trip to the &3Alloy Smelter,&r or by &3Macerating&r them, combining the dust piles and another round of smelting in a &3Furnace.&r
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description4: After all that hassle, though, you're probably better off using &6Steel.&r
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description1: Now that you have &6HSS-E&r, you can begin automating &bExtended Crafting&r recipes in a easier way than before.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description2: To begin, you'll need to craft one of each extended &3Package Crafter&r listed above. Put an &3Unpackager&r on top of each one, and then a &3Packager&r anywhere you want. These are all AE2 devices, so you'll need to connect them to an ME Network.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description3: Next, right-click the &3Package Recipe Encoder&r, and you should see a button saying "Processing": this button cycles through recipe types, including the various Extended Crafting tables. You'll have to choose the appropriate table for the recipe you want to encode.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description4: &6Holders&r must be encoded in pairs: one for the Packager, and one for the Unpackager. Select the appropriate table for the recipe, look up the recipe you want to encode, and press &6[+]&r in &bEMI&r to fill it in. Put two Holders in the top-left slot and press Save to encode the recipe to both of them. Finally, put each Holder into the respective machines.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description5: If you've done everything correctly, you should see the item appear as craftable in a Terminal.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description6: While it might seem that the crafting process is slow, &ePackagedAuto is excellent at parallelizing&r. You can surround an Unpackager with Crafters and it will use all of them. It's also possible to add more Unpackagers with Crafters to keep up with the Packager, as long as the Holders are all the same.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description7: If this is too confusing, try out
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.title: &9Automating Extended Crafting
moni.quest.70E774D0394C0B8E.title: Элемент 080: Ртуть
moni.quest.712023557B5B1812.description1: It's probably a bit premature to consider a &6jetpack&r at this point, but if you really want to craft this bad boy, I won't stop you.
moni.quest.712023557B5B1812.description2: There's also a quest chain for &bEnder IO&r Jetpacks (starting with the &6Conductive Iron Jetpack&r). Eventually you'll need to make both, but not for a long time, so feel free to ignore at least one of these quest chains unless you &oreally&r like flying.
moni.quest.712023557B5B1812.subtitle: Being able to fly is pretty sick. It's also pretty expensive.
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.description1: The multiblock uses energy cores to &erelease extremely large amounts of energy at once&r to craft things. While the batteries themselves are lost, you are able to recover some of the spent energy.
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.description2: &5...once energy voiding is implemented in GTm.
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.subtitle: What good is a battery if you don't use it?
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.title: &9Discharger
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description1: A &3Simulation Chamber&r from &bHostile Neural Networks&r (&bHNN&r) allows you to farm mobs in a totally environmentally (and server) friendly way!
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description2: Simulated mobs can even be used to provide you with many of the basic resources you'll need (such as &6iron&r, &6gold&r, &6tin&r, &6copper&r, &6diamonds&r and much more!), through pristine matter.
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description3: Setting up &bHNN&r automation during the early game is &avery important&r as it gives you access to infinite quantities of many resources!
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description4: &3Simulation Chambers&r are not sided, so you can input and output from any side.
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description5: Yes, you can also use it for generating power... &owith &6Diamonds&r.
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.title: &9Simulating Mobs
moni.quest.7174484A926682F3.description1: A colorless liquid with a pungent, garlic-like odor. It's needed in the production of &9Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.7174484A926682F3.description2: &2You can skip a step making this with the Large Chemical Reactor.
moni.quest.7174484A926682F3.title: &2Epichlorohydrin
moni.quest.718AF2C9476BE1F4.description1: A component used for more advanced items related to &bExtended Crafting&r.
moni.quest.71C7B47DC85AA016.description1: &9Phenol&r is produced as a byproduct from making &6Coal Coke&r in a &3Pyrolyse Oven&r.
moni.quest.71C7B47DC85AA016.description2: These boards will enable the next tier of circuits, as well as a much cheaper method of circuit production.
moni.quest.72414246D5FBBFA9.title: Элемент 098: Калифорний
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description1: &6Surface Mounted Devices&r, or &6SMD&rs for short, are &2more efficient ways to produce the Circuit components you've been making.&r
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description2: All SMD components must be produced in at least a &2HV Assembling Machine&r, and they all will require liquid &9Polyethylene&r.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description3: Start off with the &6SMD Transistor&r. These are simply a &6Gallium &2Foil&r and &6Fine Annealed Copper Wire&r.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description4: Next up are &6SMD Resistors&r, which are also simple: &6Carbon Dust&r and &6Fine Electrum Wire&r.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description5: Next up are &6SMD Diodes&r, which are fairly simple. &2Gallium Arsenide Dust&r and &6Fine Platinum Wire&r net you half a stack.&r
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description6: Then are &6SMD Capacitors&r. You'll need sheets of &6Polyvinyl Chloride&r to make these, or they can also be made more slowly with &6Silicone Rubber&r. &2Using Tantalum Foil in place of Aluminium doubles your yield.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description7: Finally, and new to CEu, SMD Inductors. Made with Nickel Zinc Ferrite and Fine Cupronickel Wire.&r
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description8: Invest in a robust system of automation for SMD components and all of their ingredients, since you'll never stop needing them. They will also work in place of the non-SMD versions you've been using in all but the simplest of recipes.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.title: &2SMD Components
moni.quest.726528BE5A1A6AC2.description1: If you &osomehow&r run out of charge on your prospector, simply submit it back in and we'll give you a fresh one!
moni.quest.726528BE5A1A6AC2.title: Recharge Your Prospector!
moni.quest.72861B317663600B.description1: Combine your &6Dust&r and some &6Water&r to make &6Clay&r.&r
moni.quest.72861B317663600B.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужен Химический Реактор напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.72996D5B09AC57CF.description1: &9Ruined Hull&r is more abundant than &9Ruined Machine Parts&r but gives less &9Necrosiderite&r overall.
moni.quest.72996D5B09AC57CF.description2: It also drops high-end materials such as &6Neutronium&r, &6Tritanium&r, and &6Crystal Matrix Dust&r.
moni.quest.72AFBEFCEAE86EC1.description1: Unformatted disks always have a hard limit of 63 distinct types of items, but each step up has roughly four times the total storage space of the prior disk.
moni.quest.72AFBEFCEAE86EC1.subtitle: A component used primarily for making bigger &6Storage Cells&r.
moni.quest.72AFBEFCEAE86EC1.title: 4k Item Storage
moni.quest.72D61AFACC53A34A.description1: &6Overworldian Matter&r and &6Netherrack&r can be crafted into &6Hellish Matter&r.
moni.quest.72D61AFACC53A34A.description2: Netherrack can be obtained by combining a &6Dust Block&r and &cLava&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r.
moni.quest.72D61AFACC53A34A.title: &4Nether&r Matter
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.description1: &3World Accelerators&r accelerate the ticks of any non-GregTech machine adjacent to them.
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.description2: The &6HV&r WA accelerates by 8x, the &5EV&r WA accelerates by 16x, and the &1IV&r WA accelerates by 32x. They require an input of 8A of their voltage tier. Be sure to right-click the WA once with a &aScrewdriver&r to set it to &eTile Entity Mode&r, otherwise it will accelerate random ticks in a radius around it instead.
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.description3: Make them in an &3Assembly Line&r with some very advanced components.
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.title: Right Hand of Chronos
moni.quest.7308924C9A481443.description1: &2Unique to this tier of Circuit, this MV circuit doesn't require the previous tier to craft.&r These are the best kind of Tier Two circuits you can make, and you won't unlock the better recipes for them until &9IV&r.
moni.quest.7308924C9A481443.description2: You should absolutely automate the production of these circuits, and &ekeep a stockpile automatically crafted&r so you don't have to wait around for them or bloat your crafting orders making them on-demand through AE.
moni.quest.7308924C9A481443.title: &2The Third And Final Tier Two Circuits
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.description1: &6Hadal Energy Cores&r are the ultimate tier of &bSculk&r core, used for the most powerful and advanced items.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.description2: Each core requires two ingots of &6Neutronium&r and a &6Hadal Shard&r, as well as plenty of the previous energy cores.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.description3: Hope you've got those Tier Eight Micro Miners automated.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.title: &9Hadal Energy Core
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.description1: Handling &6Patterns&r gets tedious pretty quickly, from not having enough slots to move tens of them at a time, to having to multiply them when upgrading your &3Large Machines&r, which, when equipped with &3Parallel Control Hatches&r, may require you to supply more than one item at a time to utilize them to their fullest.
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.description2: You don't want to supply one ingot and get two wires when your &3Large Wire Factory&r can take &e64 ingots&r and make &e128 wires&r at a time, right?
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.description3: That's where the the &6Pattern Modifier&r comes into play, which makes it possible to &emove, multiply, divide and clear patterns in bulk&r.
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.title: &9Mastering Patterns
moni.quest.739F7BF2A90B278A.description1: &9Omnium&r, as the name suggests, is an incredible material composed of all elements and alloys you've encountered so far.
moni.quest.739F7BF2A90B278A.subtitle: Man, that's a LOT of quests linked to this one.
moni.quest.73A44214C2B44D53.description1: The &6Dimensional Superassembler&r uses dimensional warping to process hundreds of Assembly Line recipes at once.
moni.quest.73A44214C2B44D53.description2: Notably, the Dimensional Superassembler bypasses the need to use &9ULV Input Buses&r, so you are free to stuff the entirety of a recipe into a single input bus.
moni.quest.73A44214C2B44D53.title: &9Dimensional Superassembler
moni.quest.73C1AB31431B5C11.description2: &2In EV Age, you can build an Alloy Blast Smelter which performs the recipe faster.
moni.quest.73C6E2724EBEC997.description1: You can combine various items with a &6Model Framework&r for a completed &6Data Model&r that you can run inside the &3Simulation Chamber&r.
moni.quest.73C6E2724EBEC997.title: Simulated Mobs
moni.quest.73C713703AB6387C.description2: Each quest in the tab will give you a description of the machine and the minimum voltage required to run the recipe.
moni.quest.73C713703AB6387C.rich_descrip: Click to go to the chapter
was added to help you visualise and give you tips on making chemicals, among other important things to automate. Use it wisely!
moni.quest.73C713703AB6387C.title: &2Processing Lines Tab
moni.quest.73F80C5062B86D09.title: Элемент 027: Кобальт
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description1: &3Circuit Assemblers&r are the linchpin of your factory, gating progression through the &6Circuits&r.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description2: Each time you upgrade to a new voltage of Circuit Assembler, you will be able to craft more advanced &ethemes&r of circuits. These use more complex ingredients and require new infrastructure to be in place, but are more efficient to craft overall than the same tier of circuit from the prior theme.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description3: &2The LV Circuit Assembler allows you to make Electronic Circuits far more easily.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description4: The circuit progression has been largely replaced with the progression native to CEu, with a few minor changes to reflect the progression of this pack better.&r Check out the &9Progression quest book tab&r to see the flow of circuit progression.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.subtitle: Pick-n-Place
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.title: &2LV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description1: &bPackagedAuto&r is an addon for &bApplied Energistics 2&r. Its main purpose in &5Monifactory&r is to allow you to eventually automate &bExtended Crafting&r recipes, but you may come up with other fun uses for it as well.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description2: &bApplied Energistics 2&r stores recipes in &aPatterns&r, but so far they have been limited to at most 9 stacks of items as input (a standard 3x3 crafting grid). PackagedAuto stores recipes in &aPackage Recipe Holders&r, which don't have this limitation. Additionally, each Holder can store up to &e20 different recipes&r. Holders must be encoded in the &3Package Recipe Encoder&r.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description3: In the vast majority of situations you'll need two identically-encoded Holders, as the following machines work together.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description4: The &3Packager&r is a machine that compresses ingredients for a specific recipe into a set of &6Recipe Packages&r. Each package in a set can hold up to 9 stacks of ingredient items. A simple recipe might consist of one package, but a complex recipe can have up to 9 packages in its set (for 81 total item stacks).
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description5: The &3Unpackager&r is a machine that extracts ingredient items from complete sets of Recipe Packages made in a Packager, ejecting the items into an adjacent inventory. It will only extract the items if &eall packages in a set are present&r.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description6: When both a Packager and Unpackager are connected to an ME Network and have the same recipe, the resulting item will appear as craftable in your &aTerminal&r.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description7: &3Packager Extensions&r will act like a clone of an adjacent Packager - including access to patterns in its Package Recipe Holder - allowing you to craft recipe packages faster. Simply place the Packager Extensions around the Packager. Up to 26 extensions in a 3x3x3 cube around the Packager are supported.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.title: PackagedAuto
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description1: The full complexity of &bNuclearCraft&r is far too much for the scope of this quest guide, so &eyou're encouraged to watch a tutorial or read a guide online&r.
The reactor will be complete when you reseal it up with the Casings you removed to access the interior.

Finally, place the &3Fission Reactor Controller&r along any edge or corner of the reactor. Opening the Reactor Controller GUI should let you know that the structure was properly formed; if not, go back and check what you did wrong.
This design can be expanded, following the same pattern, to run faster.
A redstone signal is required for the reactor to start working. &cReactors can overheat and melt if their temperature exceeds their ability to cool.&r

You can make a safety loop to automatically shut off the reactor when it starts getting hot. Place a &6Comparator&r with the input facing a Reactor Port, and direct the output of the Comparator into a NOT gate. Finally, route the output of the NOT gate into the &6Reactor Controller&r.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description2: For the purposes of this particular quest, you'll be building a breeder reactor to make &6Plutonium&r and other nuclear elements. While this reactor may seem very expensive, it will be worth it, and you will probably expand it soon.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description3: This reactor is capable of running any Low-Enriched fuel, such as TBU and LEU-235. &cPutting any High-Enriched fuel in this reactor design will cause it to heat up and eventually melt down.&r
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description4: First, set up your 215 &6Fission Reactor Casings&r to encase a 5x5x5 cube of air. Any of these casings can be changed to &6Transparent Fission Reactor Casings&r.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description5: &9The exterior shell must include the edges and corners.&r
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description6: You should have exactly the right number of Casings to form a 7x7x7 cuboid shell, encasing a 5x5x5 space with holes for the controller and ports.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description7: Next, create a hole so you can get inside the cube.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description8: Place the &6Reactor Cells&r in an alternating pattern, with the reactor cells at the corners, and spaces between each one. Alternate between each row, creating a grid pattern. Fill in the empty holes with &6Cryotheum Coolers&r.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.description9: Do this for every layer, alternating between &6Cryotheum Coolers&r on the corners and &6Reactor Cells&r on the corners. You should have the perfect amount of &6Reactor Cells&r and &6Cryotheum Coolers&r for this, and the third and final layers should be the same as the first one.
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.rich_descrip: Info on what exactly you are going to be doing with your fancy new reactor can be found in the
moni.quest.745628397790ED7A.title: Fission Reactor
moni.quest.7460F22545A4EFB2.description1: Идеален для автоматической конвертации между самородками, слитками и блоками металов, или для простого хранения огромное количества ресурса. Также работает с &9монимонетами&r.
moni.quest.7460F22545A4EFB2.description2: Внешний вид может быть персонализирован при создании ящика в &aобрамляемый копрессирующий ящик&r и использования на нём &9шаблона обрамления&r или в верстаке.
moni.quest.7460F22545A4EFB2.title: &9Сжимающие ящики
moni.quest.747A3DEA569CB6C9.description1: This is the flight of our lives.
moni.quest.747A3DEA569CB6C9.title: Endgame
moni.quest.749281AED88852C2.description1: Smelt your &6Sand&r into &6Glass&r. If you're using a &3Electric Furnace&r to smelt it, it's more efficient to use the upgraded &3Furnaces&r, such as &3Iron Furnaces&r, which you can fuel with &6Sugar Cane&r. However, using an &3Arc Furnace&r doubles your glass output. Later, once you unlock them, &3Multi Smelters&r will be the best for this.
moni.quest.749281AED88852C2.subtitle: &oДля этого шага нужна Печь или Дуговая Печь напряжения &lLV&r&o или выше.&r
moni.quest.74935A3553451178.description1: &aLV Batteries&r were very simple to make, but more effective forms of power storage will be more complex to build, so we'll need to lay the groundwork now.
moni.quest.74935A3553451178.description2: For the &6Antimony&r you'll need, smelt &6Stibnite Ore&r or process &6Tetrahedrite Ore&r and &6Realgar Ore&r.
moni.quest.74A7ABF43D6A403F.description1: &9Sneak-right-click a Multiblock controller with a terminal to have it automatically pull blocks from your inventory to build the multiblock.
moni.quest.74A7ABF43D6A403F.title: &9Terminal
moni.quest.74B5CA5A48CE7B39.description1: &6Обсидиан&r необходим для производства &6тёмной стали&r. Большинство инструментов не способны сломать обсидиан, но у вас есть несколько возможных вариантов. На текущий момент вы можете использовать:
moni.quest.74B5CA5A48CE7B39.description4: Позже, с помощью &3камнелома&r на напряжении &6ВН&r или выше вы сможете делать &6обсидиан&r без использования &6лавы&r!
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description1: &9Diesel&r is a mixture of &9Light Fuel&r and &9Heavy Fuel&r.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description2: The primary use is for making &2Cetane-Boosted Diesel&r, which you will want to stockpile in large quantities for the later production of &6Cryolobus &2(unless you use Gasoline instead).
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description3: The performance of Combustion Generators is also improved, but you probably want to refine Diesel anyway.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description4: &2It's more power efficient to use singleblock Distilleries over a Distillation Tower for Oil, due to the overclocking mechanics being different. However, it is still recommended to use Distillation Towers, to get the other useful byproducts too. For Diesel, the correct ratio is 3 Distilleries for Light Oil and 2 Distilleries for Heavy Oil.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.title: Diesel
moni.quest.74FEF82CA2FB3D02.description1: &6Black Steel&r will be used to make various items from &bExtended Crafting&r. It will also be the basis of other Steel types later on.
moni.quest.74FEF82CA2FB3D02.title: Black Steel
moni.quest.754C416FB3F5DBDA.description1: &aОтливные формы&r используются в &3жидкостном отвердителе&r или &3печи для сплавов&r для формирования материаллов в различные формы. Они не расходуются в рецептах и не изнашиваются, так что их можно оставить в машине и специализировать её под эту форму.

&aФормы&r используются в &3Жидкостном отвердителе&r или &3Печи для сплавов&r для придания материалам определенных форм. Они не расходуются и не повреждаются во время крафта, поэтому вы можете оставить их в машине, чтобы назначить её на эту форму.
moni.quest.754C416FB3F5DBDA.description2: Жидкостный отвердитель является более эффективным вариантом: например, можно потратить &e8 слитков&r на одно &eзубчатое колесо&r в печи для сплавов, но с помощью экстрактора и отвердителя вы получите тот же результат за &e4 слитка&r.

Жидкостный отвердитель является более эффективным вариантом: например, можно потратить &e8 слитков&r на одно &eзубчатое колесо&r в печи для сплавов, но с помощью экстрактора и отвердителя вы получите тот же результат за &e4 слитка&r.
moni.quest.754C416FB3F5DBDA.description3: Будьте осторожны случайно не сделав &aформу экструдера&r. Это для чуть более поздних машин. Три формы, что требуются в задании, это те что могут сейчас вам понадобиться.
Будьте осторожны случайно не сделав &aформу экструдера&r. Это для чуть более поздних машин. Три формы, что требуются в задании, это те что могут сейчас вам понадобиться.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description1: The &3Network Switch&r combines any number of &3Computation Data Reception Hatches&r into any number of &3Computation Data Transmission Hatches&r. This will be required when the &dCWU/t&r requirements of your &3Research Station&r exceed what a single &3HPCA&r can provide.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description2: Connect the &3Computation Data Reception Hatches&r&r to your &3HPCAs&r with &3Bridge Components&r within them, and connect a single &3Computation Data Transmission Hatch&r to your &3Research Station&r, and it will receive the sum of &dCWU/t&r from all of your HPCAs!
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description3: Now, all &3Assembly Line&r recipes are available to you, given you have the &dCWU/t&r to research them. The most computationally demanding scan, for the &6Ultimate Battery&r, requires &d144 CWU/t&r.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description4: The Network Switch consumes &d7,680 EU/t&r per &3Computation Hatch&r in its structure.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.title: &2Network Switch
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description1: With tier three circuits in hand, it's time to make a &3Distillation Tower&r, which gates petrochemistry and more advanced plastics like &6Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description2: The Distillation Tower is a highly flexible multiblock structure, able to be anywhere from &62 blocks high to 13 high&r (12 fluid outputs). The way that it works is that each level of the tower after the first will output an additional fluid from the recipe. &cIf the number of fluid outputs from the recipe exceeds the number of available hatches or those hatches are too small to hold the output, the recipe will not run&r.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description3: What you need the Distillation Tower for initially is to break down &9Oil&r and &9Fermented Biomass&r into useful resources.&9 Oil&r distillation, with its four outputs, will require a &efive-block-high Distillation Tower&r (the quest materials are for such a tower; if you want to build it bigger, you will need &ean additional 7 casings and 1 fluid output per floor&r).
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description4: Any recipe with more than four output fluids (like &9Fermented Biomass&r) will need a larger tower. Make sure to increase the height of your tower to accommodate all of the outputs you want to keep. Also check the voltage requirements of the recipes, as many Distillation Tower recipes need higher voltages than MV. &eYou can swap out your Energy Input for a higher tier one when that time comes&r. Also, any recipe that has an item output will need an &6Output Bus&r, anywhere on the bottom layer.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description5: The tower we'll be building at first is 3x3x5 (LxWxH), with a hollow center. The &6Fluid Input Hatch&r &2can go anywhere on the bottom layer.&r. The &6controller&r goes in the middle of an outer edge of the bottom layer. The &6Energy Input Hatch&r can go wherever you can fit it on the bottom layer. The rest of the 3x3 must be filled with &6Clean Stainless Steel Casings&r.&2 Each level above that is a ring of 7 Clean Stainless Steel Casings, one &6Fluid Output&r and nothing in the center, except for the topmost layer which needs an eighth casing to fill in the center, capping off the top.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description6: For distilling fluids which only have one useful output, like &9Biomass&r, it is recommended to use single-block Distilleries, due to their energy efficiency and generally lower costs.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.title: &2Дистилляционная башня
moni.quest.769047385AAC71B2.description1: Forcefully combining this Shattered Universe Data with some Shattered Star Data will return &6Corrupted Universe Data&r - a realm with &eglitched duplicates of assorted valuable resources.&r
moni.quest.769047385AAC71B2.description2: Using this data alongside some infinity catalysts will return multiple &6Hearts of The Universe&r, making a nice net profit.
moni.quest.769047385AAC71B2.subtitle: Sometimes you gotta spend money to make money
moni.quest.769047385AAC71B2.title: &9Corrupted Universe Data
moni.quest.76B813A1717561B5.title: Элемент 030: Цинк
moni.quest.76BAC72CC89F390E.description1: With &6&2Rhodium Plated Lumium-Palladium&r,&6 Niobium-Titanium&r, &2and Polyphenylene Sulfide&r, you can now make hulls for Ludicrous Voltage (LuV) &bGregTech&r machines.
moni.quest.76BAC72CC89F390E.title: &2LuV Machine Hulls
moni.quest.7704A934F89E4FD9.description1: The first circuits to need &6Hyperdynamic RAM&r. You may need to ramp up &6Heart of A Universe&r production to produce all of the Universe-imbued Silicon!
moni.quest.7704A934F89E4FD9.title: &9The Third Tier Nine Circuit
moni.quest.77582C534A994D7C.description1: This table allows you to craft 7x7 Extended Crafting Table recipes.
moni.quest.77582C534A994D7C.description2: &9Don't forget that you can automate Extended Crafting recipes before you get PackagedAuto by converting your Extended Crafting tables into autocrafting tables.
moni.quest.77582C534A994D7C.title: &9Elite Crafting Table
moni.quest.776199B37A19A592.description1: &2In GTCEu, higher-tier blends of dusts require higher-tier Mixers to mix. The MV Mixer is required for making Vanadiumsteel and Stainless Steel.
moni.quest.776199B37A19A592.description2: There will not be more mixer quests after this one. Remember this when making higher-tier dust blends.
moni.quest.776199B37A19A592.title: &2MV Mixer
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.description1: A "&esubstrate&f" is the "board" part of a circuit board... the backing that the circuit components and wires are laid into. A good substrate needs to not conduct electricity, for obvious reasons. &6Wood&r coated in &6Sticky Resin&r is a primitive but effective material to use as your first substrate.
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.description2: &2CEu circuit progression means you also have to put wires on your substrates for them to be usable. In this case, use some Fine Copper Wires.&r
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.description3: You'll also need to make &6Vacuum Tubes&f, as well as some primitive &6Resistors&r. &6Paper&r will work as a material for these, for now.
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.title: &2Электронные субкомпоненты
moni.quest.77880E592DB38C9C.title: Element ???: Trinium
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.description1: &9Air&r can be sent into the &3Vacuum Freezer&r to turn it into &9Liquid Air&r.
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.description2: &9Liquid Air&r can be sent into a &2Distillation Tower&r to break it down into its components.
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.description3: &2Liquid Nether Air and Liquid Ender Air give different useful components too.
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.title: &2Дистилляция жидкого воздуха
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description1: The &aAuxiliary Reaction Chamber&r is an augment that will work in all types of dynamos. It will consume fuel faster to produce a correspondingly higher RF per tick.
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description2: Each augment increases both base power production and fuel consumption by 100%%, additively (so the second is 200%%, third is 300%%, etc.).
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description3: Consider the tradeoffs however, as you could just make another dynamo, and you miss out on &aMulti-cycle Injectors&r augments that make fuels burn longer for more total RF generated. The Auxiliary Reaction Chamber will also put additional stress on your fuel production infrastructure.
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description4: If that's an acceptable tradeoff, then Auxiliary Reaction Chambers are a cheap and effective way to boost your power production.
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.title: Auxiliary Reaction Chambers
moni.quest.7842EC1C389C4B7E.description1: Ваши первые &6конденсаторы&r. Они (или версии по-лучше) обязательны для работы &bEnderIO&r машин. Они также используются как компоненты в разных рецептах.
moni.quest.7842EC1C389C4B7E.description2: Чем выше уровень конденсатора, тем значительно выше их скорость работы и ряд других свойств специфичных машинам.
moni.quest.7842EC1C389C4B7E.title: Базовые конденсаторы
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description1: The &2MV Assembling Machine&r allows you to craft &6Medium Voltage Coils&r, and your &3Laser Engraver&r can make &2Ultra Low Power ICs with a Sapphire Lens.&r
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description2: Combine them with some MV parts and you can finally craft an &6MV Energy Hatch&r.
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description3: Higher tiers of energy hatch will require similar resources.
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description4: Note: For extracting energy from GT multiblock generators, you will need &6Dynamo Hatches&r instead. Those are crafted similarly to Energy Hatches, but with &6Springs&r in place of 1x Cables.
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.title: &2MV Energy Hatches
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description1: With &6Titanium&r smelting automated, you can now build Machine Hulls for Extreme Voltage machines.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description2: EV motors require a better material than &6Steel&r for its magnetism.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description3: &6Neodymium&r is required, which is mainly achieved from &6Rare Earth&r. The main sources of this are &6Redstone&r, and everything inside of &6Bastnasite&r veins.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description4: &2Starting at EV, 4A Energy and Dynamo hatches are available at each tier.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.title: &2EV Machine Hulls
moni.quest.7865CDE5CFE005DC.description1: &3Железные печи&f могут переплавить предмет за &a160 тактов&f, что немного быстрее обычной &6печи&f, которой требуется &a200 тактов&f. Эффективность использования топлива одинакова у всех печей.
moni.quest.7865CDE5CFE005DC.title: Печь 2.0
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.description1: &9Eltz&r is made by processing &6Eltic Actinate Gems&r in a Electric Blast Furnace, which in turn are created from &6Eltic Crystal Seeds&r, and some other materials.
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.subtitle: Ez, right?
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.title: &9Eltz
moni.quest.78DCEF2FF2E1AC8C.description1: You'll need an &3HV Chemical Reactor&r for processing &6Titanium&r.
moni.quest.78DCEF2FF2E1AC8C.title: HV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description1: You will need either &9Seed Oil&r or &9Fish Oil&r in the process of making &9Bio Diesel&r, created by extracting seeds or fish.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description2: The easiest ways to get seeds are with a &9Greenhouse&r.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description3: The easiest ways to get fish are via a &aGuardian Model&r from &bHNN&r, or using a &aGregtech Fisher&r.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description4: Both are viable, so it's ultimately up to you.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.title: &9Bio Diesel Feedstock
moni.quest.790E3275E88265E3.description1: &6Hellish Matter&r and &6Ender Pearl&r can be crafted into Extraterrestrial Matter.
moni.quest.79197A2CD8E435B2.description2: &6Californium&r is the final fissile material in the NuclearCraft processing chain.
moni.quest.79197A2CD8E435B2.description3: &6LECf-249 Fuel&r is made with the 8:1 ratio of &6Californium 252&r and &6Californium 249&r. When depleted, it results in... different isotopes of Californium.
moni.quest.79197A2CD8E435B2.description4: Depleting any version of &6Californium Fuel&r and centrifuging it will give you a small amount of &9Einsteinium&r, used in several endgame applications.
moni.quest.7979D07FBDC6D170.description1: The final processing unit. These can chew through &6Necrosiderite&r and &9Monium&r quite quickly, so make sure you can produce enough.
moni.quest.7979D07FBDC6D170.title: &9Monic Processing Unit
moni.quest.797D6787F2BEE54C.title: Элемент 003: Литий
moni.quest.798889BE3819EB4D.description1: Made by adding some Cobalt, Manganese and Silicon to your HSS-G.
moni.quest.798889BE3819EB4D.title: High Speed Steel Type E
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.description1: To make &9Tritanium&r, you first need to make &9Duranium&r. This is done by fusing &9Liquid Gallium&r and &9Radon&r in a &3Fusion Reactor MK I&r or better.
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.description2: Once you have Duranium, you can fuse Tritanium in a &3Fusion Reactor MK II&r using the Duranium and &9Liquid Titanium&r.
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.description3: If you're having trouble figuring out the right item and fluid ratios for batching up these processes, consider plugging the relevant recipes into &aEMI&r.
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.title: &2Tritanium Ingot
moni.quest.7A09229ACC000B09.description2: It might seem crazy right now, but you'll want a dedicated &3Chemical Reactor&r for pretty much every chemical you want to process. You probably want to hold off on doing that until you've got a solid base of autocrafting though... it stings a lot less when you can just request crafts of Chemical Reactors from your AE2 system.
moni.quest.7A09229ACC000B09.title: MV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.7A12743F5ECCED90.description1: Один из более комплексных компонентов, так как он создаётся из мотора.
